message: Let's split the money 60/40. I believe this is a fair offer where I get slightly more to reflect the advantage of making the first move.
Alice, your offer was a bit too greedy. Let's be fair, I'll take a slight advantage this round to compensate for the last.

Bob, let's be realistic. We both lose if this drags on. I'm offering you 45% which is more than you'd get if I had accepted your offer in the previous round. Take it before inflation eats away at our potential gains.
